title: Making the Best Bread Ever!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Hey, Honoka-san. Have you heard of the something-tozzo bread that’s really popular right now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah~. Maritozzo, right? It’s super good. Full of cream and very fulfilling!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>As a fellow bread lover, Maru wants to ask you something zura, Honoka-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eh? What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru wants to serve it to everyone at the Christmas party. Whenever we have a party, it’s always Kanata-san that does all the cooking, so Maru wants to help out too zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I see.... I got it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh? You got it? Already? Maru hasn’t told you everything, though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I do~. You’re saying that the two of us should make a special Christmas version of it, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru hadn’t thought that far ahead.... But that sounds interesting zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I want to fill it with all kinds of delicious things besides cream! Let’s make it the most amazing thing that no one has ever seen before~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
